why.subtitle: A Digital Skill Wallet that makes credentials permanent, verifiable and portable  exactly what our plan sets out to build.
why.problemText: Certificates too often end up buried in email attachments or one off LMS downloads; links rot, institutions rebrand, and graduates lose access as soon as they leave campus. Without a reliable, shareable record of learning, students struggle to turn their skills into opportunities, teachers find it hard to prove the impact of their courses, and employers waste time manually verifying credentials they’re not sure they can trust.

immutable.title: Immutable credentials
immutable.desc: Every endorsement is hashed and anchored on a public blockchain. If the file ever changes, the hash doesnt match making tampering impossible.

wallet.title: Portable skill wallet
wallet.desc: Learners own a single wallet address. They carry verified skills from school job lifelong learning no platform lockin, no subscription fees.

workflow.title: Multistakeholder workflow
workflow.desc: Students request, teachers approve, employers verify all through rolebased dashboards defined in the project scope.

integration.title: Openstandard integration
integration.desc: Smart-contract ABIs and REST APIs follow W3C Verifiable Credential patterns, allowing other universities or HR systems to plug in with minimal effort.

why.benefitTitle: Benefits mapped to our project objectives

benefits.student: For students proof of competence that never expires, boosting employability and scholarship prospects.
benefits.teacher: For educators streamlined endorsement workflow and analytics demonstrating course impact.
benefits.employer: For employers instant cryptographic verification reduces hiring fraud and vetting costs.
